statements: SELECT * FROM editorial_calendars;
SELECT story_title, story_deadline FROM editorial_calendars WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, story_title, assigned_to FROM editorial_calendars ORDER BY story_deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendars WHERE story_deadline > '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, story_title, assigned_to FROM editorial_calendars WHERE story_deadline < '2022-10-15';
SELECT id, story_title FROM editorial_calendars WHERE story_deadline > NOW() ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendars WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe' ORDER BY story_deadline ASC;
SELECT story_title, assigned_to, story_deadline FROM editorial_calendars WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT id, story_deadline FROM editorial_calendars WHERE story_title LIKE '%announcement%';
SELECT story_title, assigned_to FROM editorial_calendars WHERE story_deadline < '2023-12-31' ORDER BY story_title ASC, assigned_to DESC;
SELECT * FROM EditorialCalendars ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT story_title, author FROM EditorialCalendars WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT story_title, publish_date FROM EditorialCalendars WHERE publish_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS story_count FROM EditorialCalendars GROUP BY author ORDER BY story_count DESC;
SELECT assigned_story, assigned_reporter, assignment_date FROM AssignmentSchedules WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM EditorialCalendars WHERE author='Jane Doe';
SELECT story_title, publish_date FROM EditorialCalendars ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT assigned_story, status FROM AssignmentSchedules WHERE assignment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND assignment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM AssignmentSchedules WHERE status='In Progress' ORDER BY assignment_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, story_title, author, publish_date, deadline FROM EditorialCalendars WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' AND deadline IS NOT NULL ORDER BY publish_date ASC, deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendars ORDER BY calendar_id DESC;
SELECT calendar_name, end_date FROM editorial_calendars WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM assignment_schedules WHERE assigned_editor = 'Alice' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT story_title, publishing_date FROM upcoming_stories WHERE publishing_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY publishing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendars ec JOIN assignment_schedules as ON ec.calendar_id = as.schedule_id;
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendars WHERE calendar_name = 'Summer 2023'
SELECT calendar_name, start_date, end_date FROM editorial_calendars WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2023-06-01' AND '2023-08-31'
SELECT * FROM assignment_schedules ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT story_title, publishing_date FROM upcoming_stories WHERE publishing_date >= CURRENT_DATE
SELECT assignment_name, assigned_editor FROM assignment_schedules WHERE deadline < '2023-12-31'
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendars;
SELECT id, event_type, event_date FROM editorial_calendars WHERE event_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT id, story_title, publication_date FROM upcoming_stories ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assignment_schedules WHERE assignment_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT id, event_description FROM editorial_calendars WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendars ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_type
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM editorial_calendars WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT story_title, story_content FROM upcoming_stories WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM assignment_schedules JOIN editorial_calendars ON assignment_schedules.assignee_id = editorial_calendars.id
SELECT story_title, deadline_date FROM upcoming_stories INNER JOIN deadlines ON upcoming_stories.id = deadlines.story_id ORDER BY deadline_date ASC
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendars;
SELECT event_name, event_date, assigned_to FROM editorial_calendars WHERE status='Active';
SELECT * FROM upcoming_stories WHERE story_deadline > '2022-08-31';
SELECT editor_name, email, department FROM editors ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT reporter_name, email, beat FROM reporters WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM reporters ORDER BY reporter_name DESC;
SELECT story_title, story_deadline, assigned_to FROM upcoming_stories WHERE status='In Progress';
SELECT event_name, event_date, assigned_to FROM editorial_calendars WHERE status='Approved' AND event_date >= CURDATE();
SELECT editor_name, department FROM editors WHERE department='News' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT assignment_name, deadline, assigned_by FROM assignment_schedules WHERE completed=FALSE ORDER BY deadline;
